plot: A romantic rivalry among members of a secret society becomes even tenser when one of the men is assigned to carry out an assassination.
title: The Ace of Hearts
plot_es: A romantic rivalry among members of a secret society becomes even tenser when one of the men is assigned to carry out an assassination.
plot_en: A romantic rivalry among members of a secret society becomes even tenser when one of the men is assigned to carry out an assassination.
